Sentencas: AISI441 alloy, an advanced ferritic stainless steel, is considered as a promising metallic interconnect material for solid oxide fuel/electrolyzer cells.
Titulo: Compatibility between AISI441 alloy interconnect and representative seal glasses in solid oxide fuel/electrolyzer cells

Sentencas: In this work, the compatibility between the AISI441 alloy and four representative seal glasses (YSO-4, G18, SABS-0, and SCAN2) has been studied.
Titulo: Compatibility between AISI441 alloy interconnect and representative seal glasses in solid oxide fuel/electrolyzer cells

Sentencas: The AISI441/glass couples are thermally treated in both air and H-2/H2O atmospheres at 800 degrees C for up to 500h.
Titulo: Compatibility between AISI441 alloy interconnect and representative seal glasses in solid oxide fuel/electrolyzer cells

Sentencas: Interfacial morphology shows that the YSO-4 glass and the SCAN2 glass have relatively high reaction tendency with the AISI441 alloy; the G18 glass devitrifies extensively during the thermal treatment; and the SABS-0 glass shows very little interaction or devitrification.
Titulo: Compatibility between AISI441 alloy interconnect and representative seal glasses in solid oxide fuel/electrolyzer cells

Sentencas: In the H-2/H2O atmosphere, the AISI441 alloy has less interaction with the sealing glasses compared with the air condition.
Titulo: Compatibility between AISI441 alloy interconnect and representative seal glasses in solid oxide fuel/electrolyzer cells

Sentencas: Different phases from interfacial reaction and devitrification have been identified for each of the sealing glasses.
Titulo: Compatibility between AISI441 alloy interconnect and representative seal glasses in solid oxide fuel/electrolyzer cells

Sentencas: Diffusion, devitrification, and reaction are the events occurring at the interface.
Titulo: Compatibility between AISI441 alloy interconnect and representative seal glasses in solid oxide fuel/electrolyzer cells

Sentencas: Overall, the AISI441/SABS-0 glass couple shows the least interfacial reaction and devitrification and the best thermal stability.
Titulo: Compatibility between AISI441 alloy interconnect and representative seal glasses in solid oxide fuel/electrolyzer cells
